introduction: 《离原》剧情简介2063年，丁馨艰难地适应着生活中层出不穷的复杂状况，她极力试图在冰冷的新世界寻找到一丝爱的暖意。最后她在无解的绝望中，决定将自己投入桥下的深渊，而此时却发现了丈夫张然未曾告诉她的秘密，记忆从四十年前的那一天开始解冻复苏……SWIMMING TOGETHER SynopsisAs 2063 dawns, DING Xin grapples with the intricate and multifaceted tribulations of existence, fervently seeking a beacon of affection in the frigid and unknown new world that surrounds her. Overcome by a tempest of unmitigated desolation, she ultimately succumbs to her despair and casts herself into the abyss beneath the bridge. Yet in this very moment of vulnerability, she uncovers a covert revelation that her husband ZHANG Ran has kept hidden from her for four decades, and her recollections, frozen for so long, finally start to thaw and resurface from that fateful day forty years ago ......
